Description: *Available Now - 6 Month Lease Max* Second floor 2 Bedroom with Parking at Woodside Condominiums in desirable Chestnut Hill. Sunny corner unit with windows in every room and views of the tree-lined courtyard. Unit features updated flooring, counters and refinished cabinets, fresh paint, and built-in AC. Convenient location near The Shops at Chestnut Hill, I-95, Rte 9, parks and public golf. Professionally managed building with tennis courts, seasonal pool, and visitor parking. Rent includes 1 deeded parking space, heat & hot water, as well as use of tennis courts and seasonal pool. Sorry, no pets. *Virtually Staged. Unfurnished*
